verses.roman:
vinā dāne eta loka yāṅra pāche haya
sei ta' gosāñā, ihā jāniha niścaya

synonyms: vinā—without; dāne—charity; eta—so many; loka—persons; yāṅra—whom; pāche—after; haya—become; sei ta'-He certainly; gosāñā—a prophet; ihā—this; jāniha—know; niścaya—surely.
translation: "Such a person, who is followed by so many people without giving them charity, must be a prophet. I can surely understand this fact."
